text: nishchay hee allaah ne apane rasool ko haq ke saath sachcha svapn dikhaaya, "yadi allaah ne chaaha to tum avashy masjide haraam (kaaba) mein pravesh karoge bekhatake, apane sir ke baal mudaate aur kataravaate hue, tumhen koee bhay na hoga." hua yah ki usane vah baat jaan lee jo tumane nahin jaanee. atah isase pahale usane sheeghr praapt honevaalee vijay tumhaare lie nishchint kar dee
